name: The Last Survivor (itch) (Parkour Ninja Kitty)
description:
A virus has spread across your world and you are the only one that hasn't been affected. This virus turns people into zombies. When these humans turn into zombies, they carry this contagious disease. Zombies cover the face of the Earth and you need to survive as long as possible. To do this, you have to exterminate the zombies.

This is an endless zombie top-down 2D shooter.

How to play:

Use W A S D to move around. The player looks at your mouse. Hold down to shoot. Pick up ammo boxes to increase your ammo and First Aid Kit to restore your health.
